name: Colorful mowing
description:
My late contribution to the  mini-jam 111 with the theme of Colors and the limitation of you are your own enemy.

My second Jam entry. A day into the jam I got hit by the 'rona. The few moments I felt decent enough I enjoyed working on this project which involved some new stuff for me to learn. Thanks for playing.

How to play

Objective:

You're the deputy golf ball remover and lawn tender at a premium golf club. To impress the staff management, remove all the golf balls and cut the grass to the perfect length - too much and it turns brown and you risk getting fired, or at least getting a lower work score.

1) Start a level

2) To move, put in a gear, using Up and Down Arrows

3) Use A and D to to steer your lawn mower across the lawn tiles to cut them.

4) When all tiles has been cut, the work is finished and you better get into the garage quick for your evaluation.

Credits:

Audio:

"Scissors, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
